import pandas as pd

def create_dataframe(df):
    df = df.dropna()
    df[['text1', 'text2']] = df['text'].str.split(n=1, expand=True)
    df[''] = df['text1'].str.slice(stop=20)
    df['text2'] = df['text2'].str.slice(stop=20)
    return df
